1.name: Issue Resolved
1.message: Some districts have reported receiving an error accessing {application}. We verified that the app is stable and you can now resume activity. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

2.name: Possible Delays
2.message: We have received reports of delays related to {application} and are investigating the delay.

3.name: Outage
3.message: {application} is unavailable. We are actively working to resolve the issue.
